name: Kangaroo Simulator
description:
You awaken to find yourself transformed into a Kangaroo. It is your mission to locate all the objects needed to complete your task. This kangaroo has special racing and driving skills so he can actually drive the 4x4 dune buggy. Play around with other Kangaroos. Uncover all the secrets. Complete all the challenging objectives. Plenty of fun places to crash and jump the off road car. You will not find a more fun animal simulator out there. If you see a snake or spider, be careful, the will attack you.

There is a huge Australian Outback map to explore. Be sure and avoid the spiders, scorpions, and snakes. They are not friendly.

Features:
--3D Kangaroo
--Excellent 3D graphics
--Hours of fun, huge map to explore
--Race around in the Dune Buggy to cover more territory
--An animal simulation game that will not disappoint you

If you have tried the other animal simulator apps like Dinosaur Simulator, Goat, Wolf, Bear, etc, then you are going to enjoy this game even more. It very polished and worth a download. Works best on newer devices. Have fun!
